member.name: M:OTG_Test_Harness.Form1.BuildGenericSelector(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String,OTG_Test_Harness.TextCompareTypes,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a selector string based on the parameters supplied Note: Any parameter left empty will not be used in the element lookup.
member.param: The html tagname of the element (ie: a, button, etc)
Boolean indicating whether to wrap all of the selectors in single quotes. Note: Primarily only useful when executing custom jQuery
The id of the element. This will handle partial matches as well (ie: '_elementdesired' will work for 'ctrl0123_elementdesired')
The html type of the element (ie: button, text, etc)
The value present on the element
The type of text comparison to use
The title attribute of the element
The class attribute of the element

member.name: M:OTG_Test_Harness.Form1.CreateClasses(System.Xml.Linq.XDocument)
member.summary: This sub takes the specified file name, loads its xml version, creates an xsd from it, parses the xsd into code classes and finally links the data from the mappingfile into the code classes
member.param: The XDocument object containing all of the prepped data for generation
